Docs.summary: Exposes the class to unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetIDsOfNames (ref Guid riid, IntPtr rgszNames, uint cNames, uint lcid, IntPtr rgDispId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetIDsOfNames(valuetype System.Guid riid, native int rgszNames, unsigned int32 cNames, unsigned int32 lcid, native int rgDispId) cil managed

Docs.param: Reserved for future use. Must be IID_NULL.
An array of names to be mapped.
The count of the names to be mapped.
The locale context in which to interpret the names.
An array allocated by the caller that receives the identifiers corresponding to the names.
Docs.summary: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetTypeInfo (uint iTInfo, uint lcid, IntPtr ppTInfo);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetTypeInfo(unsigned int32 iTInfo, unsigned int32 lcid, native int ppTInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: The locale identifier for the type information.
A pointer to the requested type information object.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can be used to get the type information for an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetTypeInfoCount(unsigned int32 pcTInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Invoke (uint dispIdMember, ref Guid riid, uint lcid, short wFlags, IntPtr pDispParams, IntPtr pVarResult, IntPtr pExcepInfo, IntPtr puArgErr);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Invoke(unsigned int32 dispIdMember, valuetype System.Guid riid, unsigned int32 lcid, int16 wFlags, native int pDispParams, native int pVarResult, native int pExcepInfo, native int puArgErr) cil managed

Docs.param: Reserved for future use. Must be IID_NULL.
The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
Flags describing the context of the call.
A pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
A pointer to the location where the result will be stored.
A pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
The index of the first argument that has an error.
Docs.summary: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
